ohu eewa bohoma daksha widiyata gayana karanawa.moratuwa katubadde dadli gomasprashnaya - maradane elpinstan sinamahale ‘peralena iranama’ chithrapataya narambaimata gos polime sirawi miyagiya pudgalayage nama kumak da?pilithura - ech.em. jaya appu namaththek.gampola ranjith bandara aththanayakaprashnaya - ‘rani ennako nangi ma pem’ githaya athulath chithrapataya kumak da?pilithura - ‘ayirangani'.piliyandala miriswaththe chamara wiෙjsinhaprashnaya - rangani shilpini anoma jinadari gana yamak kiyanna?pilithura - daksha charithanga niliyak.
